nlock Rescue Wulbren

Barcus Wroot / Grymforge

Rescue Wulbren Rewards

Asking for reward resulted in payment of 600 gold

Rescue Wulbren Notes & Tips

Wulbren will ask for something that can crack stone. He is referring to his hammer (Wulbren's Hammer) which can be found on the top floor of the jailer's room sitting on a table.
